title: United Moon Colonies by Tom Merritt
creator: Tom Merritt
description: Richard Chong just led the United Moon Colonies to victory over the Fundamentalist Union, or Fundys, saving Earth from a totalitarian madman. Now as the Moon finally gains respect on it's parent planet, a new madman wants to kill Chong. But it's not all about the President. They have an even more insidious plot to rule both worlds and bring the Fundys back for good.
subject: science fiction
moon
colony
space
politics
war
